issue.title: [R] Feather reader/writer should accept a MemoryPool
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10421](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10421). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8533#issuecomment-717516187

Currently feather readers and writers will allocate all buffers from the default memory pool. This is contrary to the Arrow convention of allowing control over memory allocation.

comments.body:
